General.Name: Upsellon Brands Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Chiron Refineries Ltd purchases, dismantles, refurbishes, operates, and sells refineries in Israel. The company also provides engineering, technical and logistical consulting, and initiative services related to refineries and components. It serves private entities, states, and government agencies. The company was formerly known as I.P.C. Oil and Gas Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to Chiron Refineries Ltd in November 2014. Chiron Refineries Ltd was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.
General.Address: Dereh Ben Gurion, Ramat Gan, Israel, 5126015
